alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 11 at 8:29PM MST until July 11 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 829 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Coolidge Airport to near Olberg to near South Mountain Park, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than a mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 157 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 148 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 169. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Arizona City, La Palma, South Phoenix, San Tan Village Mall and San Tan Valley. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
